name: Template Stencil #300: Capes 6-PACK (includes 6 different capes)
description:
FREE SHIPPING in USA! HOW IT WORKS:
  • Wet template with water or Vaseline & place onto green stuff epoxy
  • Roll over it with a rolling pin
  • Your shape emerges from the green stuff by pushing down template with pressure using a pencil eraser or bottom of hobby knife
  • Scrape shape off template stencil using scraper
  • Your shape is created in less than a minute!
  • Virtually NO CUTTING!
  • Add texture as an option (see our channel at: youtube.com/hobbyhottips)
  • Put it on any
  • Get free access to our video tutorialsto show how easy it is to make these shapes, apply them and paint them
  • Fast, Fun, & DONE!
FEATURES:
  • Use for any model conversion!
  • No experience needed
  • Already pre-measured & custom designed
  • Special Template material is re-usable & strong,multiple uses
  • Tear resistant
  • Water resistant
  • Green stuff resistant
  • Makes your armies look pristine and custom, gives them more dimension
  •  YOU WON'T FIND THESE ANYWHERE ELSE!
WHAT YOU GET:
  • Template shape(s) mailed to you via U.S. Mail (FREE SHIPPING in USA! Only $2.50 everywhere else) plus...
  • Sculpting & Painting Tutorials on our YouTube Channel
  • Each shape is sold separately (or buy a PACK of templates for a savings!)
OTHER COOL TEMPLATES AVAILABLE:
  • Pelts
  • Animal heads
  • Capes
  • Robes
  • Hoods
  • Cloaks
  • Armor
  • Kilts
  • Skulls, Skeletons
  • Creepy
  • Dragons
  • Wings
  • Dreadful Draping's
  • Tank Accessories
  • Robot Accessories
 
  • Our unique idea for custom making embellishments (using our special Template Stencils) on miniature models is sweeping the industry!
DETAILS:
  • The miniature model, green stuff, & tools pictured are not included
  • All sales are final, no refunds for Templates
  • All Templates, Stencils, Imprints, Patterns and Concepts are copyrighted and for your personal use only. All rights reserved.
